lines.text: Reverend,can I ask you? How many clocks do you think there must be in a village?
I am not sure... I am not an astronomer, you know.
But if there are two evenings in one day,it may become very annoying.
For me... for me,it's very annoying
It's really confusing to have two clocks in the village.
We can't tell the real time because of it!
People are born half dead, it takes them a whole life to die completely.
